task.title: How to Divide Numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions for using your calculator app. to divide numbers.

prereq.p: To successfully divide numbers, you must understand division.

result.p: The result from the division is displayed.

taskbody.example:
Example:
You want to divide 4 by 2. The equation will look like 4รท2=2. Press the 4 button. Press the division symbol (รท) button. Press the 2 button. Press the equals sign (=) button.
The result, the number 2, will appear on the display.
